miic.core.miic_utils.dict_sel¶

dict_sel(d, key)[source]¶

Dictionary element selection.

Return the value associated with a specified key in the input dictionary d.

Parameters:
  • d (dictionary) – Dictionary
  • key (any) – Selected key
Return type:

any
Returns:

d[key]
